sentence.Network_en: If something could disenchant voters, it would be the image of a political leader who is relying on an omnipotent image to woo votes.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个依赖以往的成绩和无所不能的形象来争取选票的政治领导人, 只会使选民感到失望.

sentence.Network_en: When we are omnipotent we shall have no more need of science.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们达到万能以后就不需要科学了.

sentence.Network_en: Doug lived in the shadow of his seemingly omnipotent father.
sentence.Network_cn: 道格生活在他那看似权威至高无上的父亲的阴影里。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... omnipresent a. 无所不在的 omnipotent a. 全能的 omniscient a. 无所示在的.
《Friends》词汇表A ... peace n. 和平, 和睦, 安宁, 静寂 omnipotent adj. 全能的, 无所不能的 hunger n. 饥饿, 欲望, 渴望v.饥饿.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... omit 省略，遗漏；疏忽 omnipotent 全能的，万能的 omnipresent 无处不在的.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... omnipotent 全能的 omnipotent 有无限能力的 omniscient 博识的.

list.abs: it is our original state of existence , a conscious entity , the embodiment of our inner Buddha , God , or all-knowing and omnipotent deity .它是我们原始存在的状态，一个意识个体。我们内在具体的佛，上帝，或全知和全能的神。
全能悖论（Omnipotence Paradox）——又称全能上帝悖论或上帝悖论，是一组关于一个“全能”的个体在逻辑学上是否可能存在的悖论 …
但这也使基督教陷入许多困难之中，如全能上帝悖论（omnipotence paradox），全知与自由意志的矛盾，伊壁鸠鲁悖论（Epicurean P…
omniscient and omnipotent God must be above such humanlike constraints ., 全知与全能的上帝理当超越人类能力的限制.
narcissistic object-choice 自恋型对象选择narcissistic omnipotence 自恋性无所不能narcissistic patient 自恋性病人

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a divine attribute): via Old French from Latin omnipotent- 'all-powerful'

entry.tran: 全能的；有无限权力的；无所不能的
entry.def: Someone or something that is omnipotent has complete power over things or people.

example.ex: Doug lived in the shadow of his seemingly omnipotent father.
example.tran: 道格生活在他那看似权威至高无上的父亲的阴影里。

auth_sentence.content: He was omnipotent, the...despot of his little world.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was omnipotent, the...despot of his little world.

auth_sentence.content: They exist in the future and past. They are omnipotent.
auth_sentence.res_content: They exist in the future and past. They are omnipotent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They exist in the future and past. They are omnipotent.

auth_sentence.content: Parliament, as we have seen, is legally omnipotent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Parliament, as we have seen, is legally omnipotent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parliament, as we have seen, is legally omnipotent.

stems_affixes.word_buile: potent[adj.强有力的]+ial……的→adj.潜在的,可能的 n.潜能,潜力
potent[adj.强有力的]+ial……的→adj.潜在的,可能的 n.潜能,潜力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 创造一切的, 有无限创造力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: omni全部,到处+fic做+ent……的→做出全部东西
omni全部,到处+potent有力的→adj.全能的
omni全部,到处+present出现的→adj.无所不在的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 全知的, 无所不知的

omni全部,到处+bus汽车→n.公共汽车
omni全部,到处+scient有知识的→adj.全知的, 无所不知的;n.无所不知者
omni全部,到处+itude状态→omnitude全的状态→无所不包的
